university: Real Academia de Ciencias Exactas, Físicas y Naturales de España
degree: Estalmat Program (Project for the Stimulation of Mathematical Talent)
description: Selected for the prestigious Estalmat program, an initiative aimed at detecting and nurturing early mathematical talent among young students in Spain.
